lexUnit.name: statement.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing

sentence.text: Turning now to his own responsibilities, when does the Leader of the House expect to be able to make a statement on expanding the provisions of communication between Members of this House and the institutions of the European Community ?
